default.name: Transformation Altar

rewards.message:
{Transformation Altar}

An altar of unknown origin lures you to it.
Seemingly you can transform your creatures here.
Prices:
{Angels-Templars}: 10000 gold, {Pegasi-Dryads}: 4000 gold,
{Giants-Drake Golems}: 10000 gold, {Demons-Succubi}: 5500 gold,
{Vampires-Werewolves}: 4500 gold, {Minotaurs-Illithids}: 6250 gold,
{Cyclopes-Couatls}: 7000 gold, {Gorgons-Troll Hags}: 8000 gold,
{Water Elementals-Tritons}: 3000 gold.

default.onVisitedMessage:
{Transformation Altar}

An altar seems to have lost its magic power.
default.onEmptyMessage:
{Transformation Altar}

An altar of unknown origin lures you to it. Seemingly you have not enough money to use its magic.
